metadata.synopsis: PAD played in case of players entering the ransacked vault which was looted by Minsc and Naheira, which has a number of muddy footprints ALWAYS visible.When players pass the check, they can connect the footrpints that they notice to the sewers, if they don't pass the check, they still spot the footprints but don't get that they have the kid of mud you usually find in the sewers.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- teleport to -704; 32; 869- Skip dialog and combat - Go to -686; 34; 870, the PAD will play

1.speaker: Player
1.text: These footprints started in the sewers.
